Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Amazon Alexa with your Smart Egg to control your devices and scenes. For example, say "Alexa, turn on Home Mode" to activate your scene 'Home Mode'.

Here’s a step by step guide:
(1). Download our "AICO" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered);
(3). Create your remotes or scenes with "AICO" app;
(4). IMPORTANT: You can rename the remotes or scenes with AICO App. So if you rename a remote or scene, then Echo will get that same name after discovered the devices in Step 8;
(5). Download Amazon Alexa app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with Alexa app;
(6). Click Enable skill of "Smart Egg", then input your account username, password and region on the accountlinking page;
(7). Talk to Echo "Alexa,discover devices.". Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed". Now new smart home devices/scenes should appear in your list;
(8). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Here are the voice commands Smart Egg has:
-----------------------
[SCENE]
"Alexa, discover my smart home devices"
"Alexa, turn on [Home Mode]”
"Alexa, turn on [Bed Room]”
"Alexa, turn on [Movie Time]”

-----------------------
[AIRCON]
"Alexa, set [DAIKIN] thermostat to 26"
"Alexa, set [DAIKIN] thermostat to automatic"
"Alexa, set [DAIKIN] thermostat to ECO"

-----------------------
[OTHER DEVICES]
"Alexa, turn on [TV]”
"Alexa, turn off [TV]”

Amazon Alexa works with AICO Smart Egg. You need setup your Smart Egg remote using the AICO mobile app before enabling this skill.


For additional information or support, visit https://www.aico.tech
